MonsterTrait.Name: Burrow Awareness
MonsterTrait.Text: A burrowling gets advantage on Perception checks if at least one other burrowling is awake within 10 feet.

MonsterTrait.Name: Pack Tactics
MonsterTrait.Text: The burrowling has advantage on attack rolls when its target is adjacent to at least one other burrowling that's capable of attacking.

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: The burrowling makes one bite attack and one claw attack.

MonsterAction.Name: Bite
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Claw
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Sling
MonsterAction.Text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage.
